XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="Demo.PEX.Production.Mixed.RemoteServiceOperation" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="com.intersystems.demo.pex.BusinessService" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.PEX.BusinessService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="true" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayPort">44444</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayExtraClasspaths">c:\PEXDemo\intersystems-PEX-demo-1.0.0.jar;c:\PEXDemo\gson-2.8.5.jar</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%remoteClassname">com.intersystems.demo.pex.MixedBusinessService</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%remoteSettings">Min=111 Max=555</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="InterSystems.Demo.PEX.MixedBusinessOperation" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.PEX.BusinessOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="true" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayPort">55555</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%gatewayExtraClasspaths">C:\PEXDemo\DemoPEX.exe</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="%remoteClassname">InterSystems.Demo.PEX.MixedBusinessOperation</Setting> </Item> </Production>
